METRIC_CATEGORY.name: outgoingTradesSendOperations
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Send to operations task - Outgoing trades

METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Current number of objects in the cache

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: memory

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: maxMemory

METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Current max memory of objects in the cache

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: requests

METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The total number of hits (Object found in cache for this operation)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: hits

METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The total number of hits (Object found in cache for this operation)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: pendingTimeByEngineAndByClass

METRIC_CATEGORY.description: EventClass Pending Time

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: init
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Heap Memory Init
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Heap memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: used
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Heap Memory Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The amount of memory currently used, including the memory occupied by all objects, both reachable , unreachable.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: committed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Heap Memory commited
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The amount of memory guaranteed to be available for use by the Java VM. The amount of committed memory may change over time. The Java virtual machine may release memory to the system.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: max
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Max Heap Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The maximum amount of memory that can be used for memory management. Its value may change or be undefined. A memory allocation may fail if the Java VM attempts to increase the used memory to be greater than committed memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: init
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Non Heap Memory Init
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Heap memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: used
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Non Heap Memory Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The amount of memory currently used, including the memory occupied by all objects, both reachable , unreachable.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: committed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Non Heap Memory commited
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The amount of memory guaranteed to be available for use by the Java VM. The amount of committed memory may change over time. The Java virtual machine may release memory to the system.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: max
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Max Non Heap Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The maximum amount of memory that can be used for memory management. Its value may change or be undefined. A memory allocation may fail if the Java VM attempts to increase the used memory to be greater than committed memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: init
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Memory Pool Init
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Heap memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: used
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Memory Pool Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The amount of memory currently used, including the memory occupied by all objects, both reachable , unreachable.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: committed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Memory Pool commited
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The amount of memory guaranteed to be available for use by the Java VM. The amount of committed memory may change over time. The Java virtual machine may release memory to the system.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: max
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Max Memory Pool
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The maximum amount of memory that can be used for memory management. Its value may change or be undefined. A memory allocation may fail if the Java VM attempts to increase the used memory to be greater than committed memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: gcFullTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Full GC Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Full garbage collection time.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: gcFullCount
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Full GC Count
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of full GC events.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: gcNewTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: New GC Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Young generation garbage collection time.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: gcNewCount
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: New GC Count
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of young generation GC Events.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: currentClassesLoaded
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: JVM Classes Loaded
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of classes currently loaded into memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalClassesLoaded
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Total JVM Classes Loaded
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of classes loaded into memory since the JVM started, included those subsequently unloaded.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalClasseUnloaded
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: JVM Classes Unloaded
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of classes unloaded from memory since the JVM started.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: jvmCompileTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: JVM Compile Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total accumulated time spent in JIT compilation.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: jvmStartTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: JVM Start Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total amount of time since the Java VM was started.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: jvmUptime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: JVM Uptime
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The uptime of the Java virtual machine.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: jvmCpuTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: JVM CPU Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total amount of CPU time that the Java VM has consumed since it was started.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: liveThreads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Live Threads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Current number of live daemon threads plus non-daemon threads

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: peakThreads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Peak Threads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Highest number of live threads since Java VM started

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: threadStarted
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Threads Started
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of threads started since Java VM started, including daemon, non-daemon, and terminated threads

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: daemonThread
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Daemon Thread
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Current number of live daemon threads

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: deadlock
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Thread Deadlock
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Deadlock Occured

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: stacktrace
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Thread Stacktrace
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The stack trace of the thread

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: major
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Proces Page Major
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: I/O page faults

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: minor
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Page Minor
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Non I/O page faults

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalPage
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Total Page
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of page faults

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: resident
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Memory Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total process residentifierent memory

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: share
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Shared Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total process share memory

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: virtual
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Virtual Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total process virtual memory

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: nice
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Nice
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Nice value of process.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: priority
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Priority
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Kernel scheduling priority of process

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: processor
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Processor
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Processor number last run on.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: threads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Threads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of active threads

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: state
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process State
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Process state (Running, Zombie, etc.)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: startTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Start Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Time the process was started in seconds.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: system
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process System Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Process cpu kernel time.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: user
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process User Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Process cpu user time

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalCpuTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Cpu Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Process cpu time (sum of User and Sys).

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: cpuPercent
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Cpu Usage
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Process cpu usage

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalFileDesc
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process File Desc
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of open file descriptors.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: up
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Process Availability
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Process Availability

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Cpu idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total system cpu identifierle.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: user
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Cpu User
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total system cpu user.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: system
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Cpu System
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total system cpu kernel

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: iowait
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Cpu Iowait
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total system cpu io wait.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: total
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Cpu Usage
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total system cpu time.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: total
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Disk Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total bytes of filesystem.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: usedpct
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Disk Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Percent of disk used.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: reads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Disk Read
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of physical disk read.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: readBytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Disk Read (bytes)
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of physical disk bytes read.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: writes
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Disk Write
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of physical disk write.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: writeBytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Disk Write (bytes)
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of physical disk bytes write.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: load15Min
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Load 15 Min
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: System load averages for the past 15 mins.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: load5Min
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Load 5 Min
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: System load averages for the past 5 mins.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: load1Min
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Load 1 Min
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: System load averages for the past 1 mins.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: used
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Memory Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total Used System Memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: free
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Free Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total Free System Memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: total
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Total Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total System Memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: uptime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Uptime
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Time since the machine started in seconds

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: threads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Process Thread
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of threads.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: sleepings
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Process Sleeping
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of processes in sleep state

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: stopped
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Process Stopped
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of processes in stop state.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: zombie
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Process Zombie
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of processes in zombie state.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: running
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Running Process
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of processes in run state.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Process idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of processes in identifierle state.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: total
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Server Total Process
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of processes.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: swapPageOut
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Swap Page Out
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Memory page Out

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: swapPageIn
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Swap Page In
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Memory page In

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: swapUsed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Swap Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total Used System Swap

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: swapFree
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Swap Free
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total Free System Swap

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalSwap
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Total Swap
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total System Swap

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpOutRsts
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp Out Rsts
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Out Restransmissions

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpOutSegments
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp Out Seg
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Out Segments

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpInErrors
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp In Errs
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: In Errors

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpInSegments
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp In Seg
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: In Segments

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpOpenedCnx
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp Opened Passive Cnx
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Open Connection

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpCnxEstablished
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp Cnx Established
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Established Connection

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpCnxFailed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp Cnx Failed
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Failed Connections

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tcpActiveCnx
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tcp Cnx Active
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Active Connections

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: memoryUsed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Oracle Process Memory Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: PGA memory currently used by the process

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: memoryAllocated
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Oracle Process Memory Allocated
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: PGA memory currently allocated by the process (including free PGA memory not yet released to the operating system by the server process)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: memoryFreeable
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Oracle Process Memory Freeable
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Allocated PGA memory which can be freed

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: cpuParseTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Query - Cpu Parse Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total CPU time used for parsing (hard and soft) in 10s of milliseconds

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: parseElapseTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Query - Parse Elapse Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total elapsed time for parsing, in 10s of milliseconds. Subtract -parse time cpu- from the this statistic to determine the total waiting time for parse resources.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalParseCount
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Query - Total Parse
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of parse calls (hard and soft). A soft parse is a check on an object already in the shared pool, to verify that the permissions on the underlying object have not changed.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: hardParseCount
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Query - Hard Parse
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of parse calls (real parses). A hard parse is a very expensive peration in terms of memory use, because it requires Oracle to allocate a workheap and other memory structures and then build a parse tree.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: executeCount
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Query - Execute Count
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of calls (user and recursive) that executed SQL statements

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: messages
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Server - Messages
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of messages processed

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: bytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Server - Bytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of bytes in all messages

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: breaks
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Server - Breaks
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of breaks

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Server - Idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total idle time

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: busy
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Server - Busy
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total busy time

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: requests
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Server - Requests
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of requests taken from the common queue in this server's lifetime

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: status
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Dispatcher - Status
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Status of the dispatcher : WAIT - Idle, SEND - Sending a message, RECEIVE - Receiving a message, CONNECT - Establishing a connection, DISCONNECT - Handling a disconnect request, BREAK - Handling a break, TERMINATE - In the process of terminating, ACCEPT - Accepting connections (no further information available), REFUSE - Rejecting connections (no further information available)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: messages
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Dispatcher - Messages
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of messages processed by the dispatcher

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: bytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Dispatcher - Bytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Size of messages processed by the dispatcher

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: busy
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Dispatcher - Busy
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total busy time for the dispatcher

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Dispatcher - Idle
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total idle time for the dispatcher

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: status
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Circuit - Status
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Status of the circuit: BREAK - currently interrupted, EOF - about to be removed, OUTBOUND - an outward link to a remote database, NORMAL - normal circuit into the local database

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: queue
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Circuit - Queue
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Queue the circuit is currently on: COMMON - on the common queue, waiting to be picked up by a server process, DISPATCHER - waiting for the dispatcher, SERVER - currently being serviced, NONE - idle circuit

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: bytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Circuit - Bytes
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of bytes that have gone through this circuit

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: break
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Circuit - Breaks
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of breaks (interruptions) for this circuit

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Events - Time Waited
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total amount of time waited for the event

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: waits
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Events - Waits
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of waits for the event

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: avgwait
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Events - Avg Time Waited
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Average amount of time waited for the event

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: timeouts
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Network Events - Timeouts
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of timeouts for the event

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: physicalReads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Physical Reads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of physical reads done

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: physicalWrites
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Physical Writes
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times DBWR is required to write

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: blockReads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Block Reads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of physical blocks read

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: blockWrites
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Block Writes
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of blocks written to disk, which may be the same as PHYWRTS if all writes are single blocks

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: readTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Read Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Time spent doing reads if the TIMED_STATISTICS parameter is true; 0 if false

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: writeTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Write Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Time (in hundredths of a second) spent doing writes if the TIMED_STATISTICS parameter is true; 0 if false

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: allocated
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Allocated
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Size of the file

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: used
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Bytes Used

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: unused
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Unused
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Bytes Unused

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: percentUsed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Percent Used
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Percentage of bytes Used

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: status
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Tablespace Status
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: File status: AVAILABLE or INVALID (INVALID means that the file number is not in use, for example, a file in a tablespace that was dropped)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: bufferCacheSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Buffer Cache Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Buffer Cache Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: sharedPoolSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Pool Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Shared Pool Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: dictionarySize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Dictionary Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Dictionary Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: redoLogSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Redo Log Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Redo Log Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: libraryCacheSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Library Cache Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Library Cache Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: sqlAreaSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: SQL Area Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: SQL Area Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: fixedAreaSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Fixed Area Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Fixed Area Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: freeMemory
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Free Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Free Memory Size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: bufferCacheRatio
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Buffer Cache Ratio
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Buffer Cache Hit ratio

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: dictionaryRatio
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Dictonary Ratio
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Dictionary Hit Ratio

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: libraryIoReloadsRatio
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Library Io Reloads Ratio
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Libray Io Reloads Hit Ratio

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: libraryLockRequestsRatio
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Library Lock Requests Ratio
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Library Lock Requests Hit Ratio

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: libraryPinRequestsRatio
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Library Pin Requests Ratio
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Library Pin Requests Hit Ratio

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: libraryReparsesRatio
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Library Reparses Ratio
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Library Reparses Hit Ratio

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: status
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment Status
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Rollback segment status: ONLINE, PENDING OFFLINE, OFFLINE, FULL

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: currentSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment- Size
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Size of the rollback segment. This value differs by the number of bytes in one database block from the value of the BYTES column of the ALL/DBA/USER_SEGMENTS views.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: extents
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment- Nb Of Extents
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of extents in the rollback segment

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: writes
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment Writes
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of bytes written to the rollback segment

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: gets
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment Gets
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of header gets

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: waits
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment Waits
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of header waits

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: hmwSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment HWMSize
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: High-watermark of rollback segment size

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: shrinks
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment Shrinks
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times the size of a rollback segment decreases

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: wraps
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment Wraps
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times rollback segment is wrapped

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: extends
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Rollback Segment Extends
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times rollback segment size is extended

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: gets
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Latch Gets
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times the latch was requested in willing-to-wait mode

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: misses
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Latch Misses
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times the latch was requested in willing-to-wait mode and the requestor had to wait

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: immediateMisses
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Latch Immediate Misses
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times a no-wait latch request did not succeed (that is, missed)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: immediateGets
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Latch Immediate Gets
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times a latch was requested in no-wait mode

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: missRate
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Latch Miss Rate
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Ratio Misses / gets

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: waitTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Latch Wait Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Elapsed time spent waiting for the latch

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: sleep
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Latch Sleep Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times a willing-to-wait latch request resulted in a session sleeping while waiting for the latch

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: lockType
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Lock Type
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Type of user or system lock The locks on the user types are obtained by user applications. Any process that is blocking others is likely to be holding one of these locks. The user type locks are: TM - DML enqueue, TX - Transaction enqueue, UL - User supplied, The locks on the system types are held for extremely short periods of time.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: modeHeld
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Lock Mode Held
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Lock mode in which the session holds the lock

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: modeRequested
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Lock Mode Requested
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Lock mode in which the process requests the lock:

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: id1
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Lock id1
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Lock resource #1 (depends on type)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: id2
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Lock id2
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Lock resource #2 (depends on type)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: waits
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Wait Event - Waits
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of waits for the event

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: totalTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Wait Event - Wait Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total amount of time waited for the event

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: percentage
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Wait Event - Wait Ratio
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Ratio current time waited / sum of of time waited

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: status
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Status
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Wait state: 0 - WAITING (the session is currently waiting), -2 - WAITED UNKNOWN TIME (duration of last wait is unknown), -1 - WAITED SHORT TIME (last wait less than 1/100th of a second), greater than 0 - WAITED KNOWN TIME (WAIT_TIME = duration of last wait)

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: event
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Event
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Resource or event for which the session is waiting

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: waitTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Wait Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: A nonzero value is the session's last wait time. A zero value means the session is currently waiting.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: logonTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Logon time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Time of logon

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: elapsedTime
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Elapsed Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total elapsed time for parsing, in 10s of milliseconds. Subtract - parse time cpu - from the this statistic to determine the total waiting time for parse resources.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: cpuUsed
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Total Cpu Time
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total CPU time used by non-user calls (recursive calls). Subtract this value from -CPU used by this session- to determine how much CPU time was used by the user calls.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: memorySorts
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Memory sorts
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of sort operations that were performed completely in memory and did not require any disk writes You cannot do much better than memory sorts, except maybe no sorts at all. Sorting is usually caused by selection criteria specifications within table join SQL operations.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: tableScans
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Table Scans
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of table scans

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: physicalReads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Physical Reads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of data blocks read from disk. This value can be greater than the value of -physical reads direct- plus -physical reads cache- as reads into process private buffers also included in this statistic.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: logicalReads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Logical Reads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The sum of -db block gets- plus -consistent gets-. This includes logical reads of database blocks from either the buffer cache or process private memory.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: commit
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session User Commits
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of user commits. When a user commits a transaction, the redo generated that reflects the changes made to database blocks must be written to disk. Commits often represent the closest thing to a user transaction rate.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: cursor
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Current Open Cursors
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of current open cursors

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: physicalWrites
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Session Physical Writes
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total number of data blocks written to disk. This statistics value equals the sum of -physical writes direct- and -physical writes from cache- values.

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: gets
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Pool Gets
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times a lock was requested for objects of this namespace

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: getHits
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Pool Get Hits
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times an object's handle was found in memory

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: pins
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Pool Pins
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times a PIN was requested for objects of this namespace

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: pinHits
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Pool Pin Hits
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of times all of the metadata pieces of the library object were found in memory

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: reloads
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Pool Reloads
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Any PIN of an object that is not the first PIN performed since the object handle was created, and which requires loading the object from disk

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: invalidations
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Shared Pool Invalidations
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: The total number of times objects in this namespace were marked invalid because a dependent object was modified

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: pinMemory
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Cache In-use memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Total size of library cache in-use memory objects

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: objectsPinnedcount
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Cache In-use Objects
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of library cache memory objects currently in use in the shared pool

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: unpinMemory
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Cache Freeable Memory
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Size of library cache freeable memory objects

METRIC_CATEGORY.name: objectsUnpinnedCount
METRIC_CATEGORY.label: Cache Freeable Objects
METRIC_CATEGORY.description: Number of freeable library cache memory objects in the shared pool
